QuestData.Title: Sacrifices
QuestData.Description: You don't have to do this, $n. You've done more than enough already.$B$BBut if you decide to stay... I'd be a fool to turn you away.$B$BMy men have fortified their position inside the cathedral and are ready for what comes next.$B$BI'm about to head there and take as many of these flea-ridden devils with me as I can. You're welcome to come along for the ride.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride with Lord Darius Crowley and round up 30 Bloodfang Stalkers.
